name: Team 22 - Cadavre Exquis
description:
It’s time to open your shop and create some magic ! 

This game was made for our Godfather Jam in 3 days. The teams were reunited for a special Jam with a Retrogaming theme and were lended some old game consoles. Our team of 9 students were assigned the SNES with a specific parameter : a Yoshi egg ! 

Pitch

In Cadavre Exquis, you are a greedy chimera seller seeking infinite wealth ! 

You’ll need to trade with your fellow merchants to gather the necessary elements for your precious creature’s evolution. 

What will come out of the egg ? What will it become ?

Meet the team !

Faustine ARAGNOU and Mathis CALMETTES - SOMBRIS designed our wonderful marketplace and creatures assets'. 

Our Game Designers took special care to make sure the game's experience will be the best. You can thank  Romain DE LEUZE, Nicolas FAUCHAY, Enzo GOURLAY and Julien BLONDELOT.

It was a hard job to have the game functioning perfectly : Tom LENAERTS and Nicolas MANACH were in charge of the programming aspect of the project.

The producer Marie Wajsblat handled the management of the team and kept track of the priorites of the project.
